item.title: 100 errors below yell command
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3)){
c2.sendMessage("<shad=16711680>[Donator]<img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
} else if (c.playerRights == 1){
c2.sendMessage("<shad=16711935>[Moderator]<img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
} else if (c.playerRights == 2){
c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Administrator]<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Jack”)){
c2.sendMessage("<shad=123123>[Owner]<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
} else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“E3”)){
c2.sendMessage("<shad=123123>[Co-Owner]<img=4>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
} else if (c.playerRights == 0 && c.isDonator == 0) {
c.sendMessage("<shad=6081134><img=0>You must be a Donator to use yell!<img=0>");
}
}
}
}

if (playerCommand.startsWith("vet")) {
	for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
		if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
			Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
			if (c.playerRights == 4 && c.isDonator == 2) {
				c2.sendMessage("<shad=12595455>[Veteran]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
			}
		}
	}
}[/code]

Try that. If that doesn’t fix it, then it’s something else you messed up on.

item.dc:creator: @V_1_N_C_H V 1 N C H
item.description:
@V_1_N_C_H wrote:

Had a bit of a derp moment there, sorry. Try replacing what you gave me with this:

[code]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

                                                    if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3)){
                                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=16711680>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                    }else if (c.playerRights == 1){
                                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=16711935>[Moderator]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                    }else if (c.playerRights == 2){
                                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Administrator]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                    }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Jack")){
                                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=123123>[Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                    }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("E3")){
                                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=123123>[Co-Owner]</col><img=4>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
            
                                                    }else if (c.playerRights == 0 && c.isDonator == 0) {
                                                            c.sendMessage("<shad=6081134><img=0>You must be a Donator to use yell!<img=0></col>");
                                                    	
						}
					}
				}
			}
    
    
                                if (playerCommand.startsWith("vet")) {
                            for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
                                    if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
                                            Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
                                            
                                    if (c.playerRights == 4 && c.isDonator == 2) {
                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=12595455>[Veteran]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                    
                                    }
                                        }
                                    } [/code]

If that doesn’t work, then the error isn’t in the code you posted.

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

for the most part when you get 100 errors you’ve missed a bracket some where, check to make sure every open bracket is also closed. An IDE would help you greatly.

if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
